channel.title: Missing support for Basic Authentication Mode
channel.description:
Hidden service authentication is not supported on Whonix Workstation Tor Browser, tested on Whonix 15 and Whonix 16
Now that OnionShare supports client hidden service authentication to share files, just share one file in the latest onionshare version and paste the url in tor browser, it won't load

item.title: Missing support for Basic Authentication Mode
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Missing support for Basic Authentication Mode

item.title: Missing support for Basic Authentication Mode
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Duplicate:

Issues with onion service authentication Support
As said in telegram just now. on Whonix-Gateway: sudo journalctl -f -b --no-pager -u onion-grater FYI: onion-grater/40_onion_authentication.yml at master · Whonix/onion-grater · GitHub Try this: onion-grater: a Tor Control Port Filter Proxy I am not sure this can be made to work. I failed to implement this. Only @JeremyRand comes to mind who might be able to fix this. Not sure if he’s up for hire?

Read full topic
